data.title: Timiskaming Funeral Cooperative
data.text:
27 messages received

Elgar family

Dan was a very special person. Loved his family dearly. He will be missed.

Cindy Pearson, June 6, 2022

Nathalie & Family

My deepest sympathy to you and your family during this difficult time. He will be missed.

Doug & Rose Brazill , June 6, 2022

Nathalie, Jacob and Riley

Nat, Jacob and Riley: We are so very sorry for your loss.

Alissa James, June 6, 2022

Nathalie, Jacob, Riley & family

Our sincere condolences Nathalie & family..our thoughts and prayers are with you all during this difficult time

Julie Belanger , June 6, 2022

The Elgar family

We offer our deepest condolences to the family on the loss of a husband and father.

Bob & JoAnn Chatelain, June 6, 2022

Nathalie Gauthier

Dear Nathalie I was so sorry to hear about the passing of your husband. You are in my thoughts. Be strong when you have to but let the people who love you comfort you when you need it. Don't be afraid to reach out to people. You will get through this but it takes time, a lot of time. Take care, love you

Aunt Joanne

Joanne Leveille, June 6, 2022

Nathalie, Jacob and Riley

I’m so sorry for your loss, sending you and your family love and courage. Big Hugs!❤️

Céline Duguay, June 6, 2022

Thé elgars

Although our relationship was a short one… we were all destined to have met you Danny, you embraced us like we were not strangers from night one fish fry. Our children learned to love you like another uncle in their lives, an uncle they got to laugh and share fish stories with while at Lady E and we will forever be grateful for those moments …. We will look for you when we crest over the dam … we will look for you when we put our line in the water and catch the big one, we will dedicate our return to the island and first fire in your honour Dan…❤️

Lalonde, June 6, 2022

The family

My sincere condolences!

Sylvie Cormier-Rivard, June 7, 2022

Nat and the boys

Mes sympathies à toi et tes garçons. Tu es dans mes pensées.

Nancy et Joël Laquerre, June 7, 2022

Natalie, Jacob and Riley

There are no words to describe Dan and the impact that his absence will have in our circle of life long friends. Dan has left a loving mark in our lives, his humor, generosity, wise advice with a touch of sass but most importantly his love for his family and friends...Jeff, Colton and Vic, and myself are carrying a heavy heart with this very sad news, but we are forever grateful that we knew Dan and called him our friend....fly high Dan, there are many Angel's waiting to greet you, to welcome you, most of them who know you best will have a cold rum and coke in hand and a long hug my friend...xox The neighborhood will never be the same without you in it....We will miss you dearly and we are sending Nat and your boys all our love and light. Rest easy Newf Xoxoxo

Wendy and Jeff Jibb, June 7, 2022

Nathalie, Riley et Jacob

Mes sympathies à vous. Prenez soin

Hélène Gervais , June 7, 2022

The Elgar Family

Our sincere condolences Natalie,Jacob and Riley.

Normand and Anita Gervais , June 7, 2022

Nathalie,Jacob,Riley et famille

Nos sincères condoléances à toute la famille.Nos pensées et prières sont avec vous autres. Grosse caresses.

Norm et Jeanne Loranger, June 7, 2022

The families of Danny

Danny and his parents lived next door to us while we lived in Harbour Deep. They were the salt of the earth…they made us feel at home, moving there and not knowing anyone… he was the sweetest little boy…that friendship carried on through the years with his Mom… thanks to social media we could keep in touch with Danny.. loved seeing his comments on photos and in turn seeing his family photos as well …. Please accept my sincere condolences during this sad time.. my thoughts and prayers are with you all.. Hod Bless .

Jackie Rumbolt, June 8, 2022

The Families of the late Danny Elgar

Saddened and shocked to hear of the passing of Danny. Sincere condolences to all the families. R.I.P Danny.

Baxter & Annie Ropson, June 8, 2022

Daniel's family, Marion and Sharon

My most sincere sympathy on the loss of your husband, father, son and brother. Please take comfort in knowing that others care and are thinking of you all during this very sad time. May God give you strength to deal with your personal grief. May Daniel RIP.

Doris Okihiro, June 8, 2022

Nat and Boys

My deepest sympathies Nat and boys

Sydney McDougall, June 8, 2022

Natalie, Jacob and Riley

Please know that you are in our thoughts and prayers.

The times that my boys and I spent with Danny and your family at Lady Evelyn will never be forgotten. He will be missed and the Island will never be the same.

Our heartfelt condolences,

Jerry, Janice,Jeremy and Joshua Hoover

Love you all!

Jerry Hoover , June 8, 2022

The Families of the late Danny Elgar

We are shocked and saddened to hear of Danny’s passing. Our thoughts and prayers are with you all at this very difficult time.

Linda and Kirby Brown, June 10, 2022

The Elgar Family

My heartfelt sympathies to you all. Danny and I were friends 40-plus years ago when I’d visit nan (Annie Murcell) in Harbour Deep during the summers. I’m so sorry to hear of his passing and am keeping you all in healing thoughts.

Susan Russell, June 12, 2022

The Elgar family

So sorry to hear of Danny's passing, growing up he was like my baby brother. We spent a lot of hours playing and getting in trouble together. I can't believe he's gone. The last time we talked was about a couple years ago, reminiscing about our younger days for a couple hours until his phone died. It was so nice to hear from him. Never thought it would be the last time. Such a great guy. He will be sadly missed. My deepest condolences to all those who loved him. I hope you can take comfort in the sweet memories you have of him. Rest in peace, Danny. Love you. ❤️

Janice Mahon (Elgar), June 12, 2022

Natalie

We are saddened to hear the new of Danny passing. Our thoughts and prayers go out to you and your boys. May you hold his memories close, lots of love to you. RIP Danny Boy

Pat & David Layden (1st Cousin), June 13, 2022

Daniel Elgar

Natalie, it was with great sadness to hear of Danny’s passing. Our deepest condolences for you and your boys. Our thoughts and prayers are with you.

Danny may you Rest In Peace!

David Layden, June 13, 2022

Elgar Family

I just received the news of Danny’s passing. My sincerest condolences to his wife and sons. Danny was my mom’s cousin. But he and I were closer in age. 1 year apart. Danny lived with us for a while in Brampton when he was working for a cable company. We had many laughs. My thoughts are with you.

Tammy Harnum , June 13, 2022

Nathalie and family

I am so sorry for your loss!

My deepest sympathies to you and your family.

Mary-Lou Lauzon , June 24, 2022

Natalie

I am so sorry to have just heard this. He was a great friend. I loved seeing him hunting the odd year. He will be missed. Prayers for you and your boys

Rob Jackson, July 29, 2022
